tweets.text:
They've admitted this is happening but refuse to take strong enough action to stop it. 
This has to be the big question. 
Are @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids @PHE_uk  using the people of Newcastle under Lyme as guinea pigs. Tell me another reason why they wont stop this. https://t.co/p4rXDi8c1K

Following the fire at a former waste site in #Telford last week our officers are also monitoring the #RiverSevern from south #Shrewsbury to north of #Gloucester to check for any environmental impacts

#Shropshire @TelfordWrekin @PHE_WestMids @shropsfire https://t.co/wb94TEmA0K

UPDATE - After the appeal we put out last night to @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup & @NESouthWest there was no nest destruction today at the River Otter Restoration Project in Devon and the partners are reconsidering their plans - thank you . Top work @WiseBirding et al . https://t.co/A8KSk5gcuE

Officers worked behind the scenes to make sure the #Ely boat race went smoothly.

This involved ensuring the river remained closed so that no boaters could enter the race circuit. 

Also fixing any obstructions on the river that could disturb the race. #FunFactFriday @theboatrace https://t.co/F2BXwuvKD3
